name: A Christmas Rush
description:
It’s the day before Christmas and Santa Claus has given you his wallet. He does not have enough time to give presents to you and your closest, so it is on you to save christmas. Go to the nearest shop and spend as much money as possible on presents for everyone. You better watch out, cause there are fellow shoppers in there and the stories say that they steal the most valuable of carts and that they do not steal them gently. Happy hunting!

OBJECTIVES

  • Get a hold of a cart.
  • Gather as many presents as you can.
  • Avoid getting disrupted by fellow shoppers.
  • Spend as much money as possible.
  • Save Christmas

HOW IT “THEMES”

  • I guess I have to explain… The more money you have, the worse Christmas you and others will get.

HOW TO PLAY

  • W,A,S,D - Movement
  • Left Mouse - Pick up (You need a cart to pick up presents)
  • F - Drop Cart
  • Left Shift - Charge (Charge with a cart and knock other’s carts out of their hands)
  • Escape - Restart
